page.title: 15HOME LIFE, GRAINTHORPE
page.content: David Age 10 years. I woke up at 7.05am today and I went down to take the dogs for a walk.Later mum came down and I had breakfast and a drink of chocolate.I got my lunch ready, and brushed my teeth.At 8.30 my dad gave me a lift to school where I put my bag away and went out to play. After Assembly I wrote in my Week-end Diary and we did two maths tests.Lunch was at 12.00 and we picniced outside. At 1.15 we went back inside and we had more lessons, until we left at 3.30 . After school I went with my friend Jake to his Grandma's. Afterwards, at home, for dinner I had sausage and chips. I watched TV.until my friends came to play football. At 9.00pm I put my bike away ,had a bath and went to bed.
